Use a "If only I had started earlier" ladder to visualize the missed opportunities and progress that could have been made if the assignment had been started earlier.
Create a "Time Travel Ladder" thatically shows the impact of starting the assignment earlier and how it could have affected the current situation.
Construct a "Regret Ladder" that highlights the emotional journey of regretting not starting the assignment earlier and how it could have changed the outcome.
Design a "Procrastination Ladder" that shows the consequences of delaying the start of the assignment and how it could have impacted the final result.
Create a "Time Management Ladder" that demonstrates the importance of starting the assignment earlier and how it could have improved the efficiency and quality of the final product.
